channel.title: WARNING I think I've deleted the community library (SOLVED)
channel.description:
Hi all,
DON'T SYNC YOUR LIBRARY
I was uploading some objects and when I resynced it looks like I've somehow deleted the rest of the library as it's only showing my stuff... My friend synced his library and lost the other objects too.
I'm really really sorry, I didn't know it was even possible and have no idea how I did it!
@johannes @thetechnobear
Help!
I have the library backed up on my hard drive

item.title: WARNING I think I've deleted the community library (SOLVED)
item.dc:creator: @MattilynMattroe
item.description:
@MattilynMattroe wrote:

Thanks so much, and sorry once again

Read full topic
item.source: WARNING I think I've deleted the community library (SOLVED)

item.title: WARNING I think I've deleted the community library (SOLVED)
item.dc:creator: @thetechnobear Mark Harris
item.description:
@thetechnobear wrote:

you deleted other objects from the community library, then pushed the change.

I have reverted all your commits today,
so the library is back as it was before your changes

so the issue is now solved

so BEFORE you reset your library again, make sure you have a copy of YOUR objects, as when you do a reset your objects will disappear.

Read full topic
